Package org.selman.java3d.book.myjava3d

Interface Summary
GeometryUpdater Definition of the GeometryUpdater interface.
RenderingEngine Definition of the RenderingEngine interface.
 

Class Summary
AnimatingSurface This class implements a rendering surface that will repaint itself continiously using a low-priority thread.
AwtRenderingEngine Implementation of the RenderingEngine interface using AWT.
MyJava3D Renders a 3D shape using a 3D rendering engine that was written from scratch using AWT for graphics operations.
NoOpGeometryUpdater Implementation of the RenderingEngine interface that does nothing.
RenderingSurface Surface (JPanel) that uses a RenderingEngine to render a 3D scene.
RotatingGeometryUpdater Implementation of the GeometryUpdater interface.
Surface The Surface class implements a 2D rendering surface using a Swing JPanel.
